name: Arknights Chibi LoRA
description:
Disclaimer: Some preview images were obtained at different stages of the training process and will not match your output 1:1. They are here to give you an idea of what this LoRA looks like.

A dataset of 1105 assembled sprites, each downloaded painstakingly one-by-one and denoised through a batch converter, were used in the making of this LoRA.

Compatible with other character LoRAs.

Recommended tags to use to replicate Arknights' sprites:

  • chibi

  • full body

  • cel-shaded

  • flat colors

  • arknights-inspired clothing

Recommended dimension ratio: 1:1

512x768 produces taller chibis.

Lower/increase weight as needed. Works at fine at 1.


Enjoy.

meta.prompt: chibi, full body, standing, fox ears, tail, platinum blonde hair, blue eyes, sweater dress, bottomless, barefoot, indoors, hydroponics, ahoge, disheveled hair,  <lora:AKTEST-09:1>, standing straight
meta.negativePrompt: (low quality, worst quality:1.4), (bad anatomy), (inaccurate limb:1.2), bad composition, inaccurate eyes, extra digit, fewer digits, (extra arms:1.2)

meta.prompt: (masterpiece, best quality:1.2),  <lora:AKTEST-10:1> chibi, platinum blonde hair, blue eyes, sweater dress, full body, bare feet, (flat shading), (anime cel-shaded:1.1), fox ears, large tail, fox tail, fluffy tail
meta.negativePrompt: (low quality, worst quality:1.4), (bad anatomy), (inaccurate limb:1.2), bad composition, inaccurate eyes, extra digit, fewer digits, (extra arms:1.2), animal ears
